scripts.start:webui: NODE_ENV=dev cd mods/webui && npm run dev
scripts.start:storybook: NODE_ENV=dev cd mods/webui && npm run storybook
scripts.start:apiserver: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev LOGS_LEVEL=verbose nodemon --watch mods/apiserver mods/apiserver/src/index.ts
scripts.start:authz: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev LOGS_LEVEL=verbose nodemon --watch mods/authz mods/authz/src/server/server.ts
scripts.start:voice: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev LOGS_LEVEL=verbose nodemon --watch mods/voice mods/voice/src/demo.ts
scripts.start:autopilot: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev ASSISTANT=$(pwd)/config/assistant.json LOGS_LEVEL=verbose nodemon --watch mods/autopilot mods/autopilot/src/server.ts
scripts.start:services: cross-env docker compose -f compose.yaml -f compose.dev.yaml up routr nats envoy influxdb postgres adminer mailhog rtpengine asterisk simplephone -d --remove-orphans
scripts.start:audiosocket: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev LOGS_LEVEL=verbose nodemon --watch mods/streams mods/streams/src/example.ts
scripts.start:mcp: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev LOGS_LEVEL=verbose nodemon --watch mods/mcp mods/mcp/src/index.ts
scripts.stop:services: cross-env docker compose -f compose.yaml -f compose.dev.yaml down
scripts.postbuild: npm run copy:hbstemplates && npm run copy:prisma-clients
scripts.clean: rimraf mods/**/dist mods/**/node_modules mods/**/package-lock.json node_modules package-lock.json
scripts.db:migrate: npx prisma migrate dev --schema mods/apiserver/schema.prisma --name changeme --preview-feature && npx prisma migrate dev --schema mods/identity/schema.prisma --name changeme --preview-feature
scripts.generate:readme: lerna run generate:readme && git add mods/**/README.md
scripts.generate:prisma-clients: npx prisma generate --schema mods/apiserver/schema.prisma && npx prisma generate --schema mods/identity/schema.prisma
scripts.preintegration:web: npx playwright install && npx playwright install-deps
